remarks: Structure product weak ordering.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
prdsbas.p $e |- P = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsbas.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
prdsbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
prdsbas.i $e |- ( ph -> dom R = I ) $.
prdsle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` P ) $.
prdsle $p |- ( ph -> .<_ = { <. f , g >. | ( { f , g } C_ B /\ A. x e. I ( f ` x ) ( le ` ( R ` x ) ) ( g ` x ) ) } ) $.
$d B f g x $.
$d I f g x $.
$d P f g x $.
$d R f g x $.
$d S f g x $.
$d f g ph x $.
